Package org.infinispan.configuration.cache

Class GroupsConfigurationBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.infinispan.configuration.cache.GroupsConfigurationBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Builder<GroupsConfiguration>, ClusteringConfigurationChildBuilder, ConfigurationChildBuilder
public class GroupsConfigurationBuilder extends Object implements Builder<GroupsConfiguration>
Configuration for various grouper definitions. See the user guide for more information.
Author:
pmuir
